column4: if you're talking about all the bounceattack.txt files... if you closed them all you are safe and don't need to do anything
xchat will open a filesystem window to let you pick where you want to save the attack file...
so that might be the case - so it isnt a hack right? just anoyying attack attempt?
if you didn't save the files and then run them, you are perfectly fine... just some lame-o script kiddie with nothing better to do.
